result.eng: The parliament will have the right to amend the budget.
result.ga: Beidh de cheart ag an pharlaimint an buiséad a leasú
result.orig: Beidh de cheart ag an pharlaimint an buiséad a leasú
result.html: Beidh de cheart ag an pharlaimint an buiséad a leasúThe parliament will have the right to amend the budget.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ de ċeart ag an ṗarlaimint an buiséad a leasúThe parliament will have the right to amend the budget.

result.eng: We'll have to wait until Budget Day.
result.ga: Beidh orainn fanacht go Lá na Cáinaisnéise
result.orig: Beidh orainn fanacht go Lá na Cáinaisnéise
result.html: Beidh orainn fanacht go Lá na CáinaisnéiseWe'll have to wait until Budget Day.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ orainn fanaċt go Lá na CáinaisnéiseWe'll have to wait until Budget Day.
